TASK: Craft an item of type: green_stained_glass_pane
inventory=[{"type": "bubble_coral", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "cooked_mutton", "quantity": 59, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 6, "index": 12}, {"type": "netherite_scrap", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 58, "index": 25}, {"type": "diamond_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 29, "index": 36}, {"type": "phantom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 23, "index": 42}, {"type": "suspicious_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft the green stained glass pane, I need to place green stained glass blocks in the crafting grid. The green stained glass block is in slot 12, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1
